desc.en: On the last day of the holidays, Fuuka is still busy with School Lunch Club business. Sensei arrives to whisk her away and takes her to all sorts of places. When she understands that Sensei is trying to create a special holiday memory for her, Fuuka gives them her most heartfelt thanks.
desc.jp: On the last day of the holidays, Fuuka is still busy with School Lunch Club business. Sensei arrives to whisk her away and takes her to all sorts of places. When she understands that Sensei is trying to create a special holiday memory for her, Fuuka gives them her most heartfelt thanks.
desc.zh_cn: 连假最后一天{cf风华}也打算忙{cn供给部}的事，于是老师绑架了她，带着她去了很多的地方。忙碌地过了一天后，{cf风华}明白老师是为了让自己在连假的尾声创留下特别的回忆，于是带着真心向老师道谢。

desc.en: amusement park ferris wheel carousel rotate horse sunlight outside playground
desc.jp: amusement park ferris wheel carousel rotate horse sunlight outside playground

hobby.en: Making home-cooked meals, packing bento lunches

name.en: Even If It's a Little Off
name.jp: Even If It's a Little Off

hobby.en: Making home-cooked meals, packing bento lunches

name.en: The Test of a Genius Hacker
name.jp: The Test of a Genius Hacker

desc.en: Despite their best effort to meet up with Himari on time, Sensei ends up getting roped into all sorts of accidents. After just barely overcoming these setbacks, Sensei realizes that it was all planned by Himari in an attempt to test Sensei based on something she saw in a horoscope magazine. Upon learning the truth, Sensei reads Himari the riot act.
desc.jp: Despite their best effort to meet up with Himari on time, Sensei ends up getting roped into all sorts of accidents. After just barely overcoming these setbacks, Sensei realizes that it was all planned by Himari in an attempt to test Sensei based on something she saw in a horoscope magazine. Upon learning the truth, Sensei reads Himari the riot act.
desc.zh_cn: 老师本想准时到达和{cf阳葵}约定的地方，却卷入了莫名其妙的意外。好不容易克服所有意外且抵达了约定的场所，但后来才发现，这一切都是{cf阳葵}看过运势杂志后，刻意安排来测试老师的。得知真相后，老师开始对{cf阳葵}说教。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Hinata and Sensei arrive at the riverside to obtain the Miracle 5,000 Cake, however, the Helmet Gang has kidnapped the baker. Sensei and Hinata join forces with the nearby After-School Sweets Club to go and rescue the baker.
desc.jp: Hinata and Sensei arrive at the riverside to obtain the Miracle 5,000 Cake, however, the Helmet Gang has kidnapped the baker. Sensei and Hinata join forces with the nearby After-School Sweets Club to go and rescue the baker.
desc.zh_cn: 为了取得「Miracle5000」蛋糕而来到江边的老师和{cf日向}。但是头盔团绑架了面包师傅，导致无法取得蛋糕。两人在江边遇到正在感到困扰的{cn放学后的甜点部}，并和他们一起去拯救面包师傅。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
